name: media
title: Media
description: Multimedia items for a taxon such as an image, audio or video.

fields.name: taxonID
fields.description: Pointer to the taxon referring to an existing Taxon.ID within this data package.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the [metadata.yaml](https://github.com/CatalogueOfLife/coldp/blob/master/metadata.yaml)

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL that resolves to the media item itself, not a webpage that depicts it.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The MIME-type of the media item the url identifies. Preferrably the full type/subtype combination, e.g `image/jpeg`, but the primary type alone is sufficient (`image`, `video`, `audio`).

fields.name: created
fields.description: type: [ISO8601 date](https://specs.frictionlessdata.io//table-schema/#date) Date the media item was recorded.

fields.name: link
fields.description: Optional webpage from the source this media item is shown on.
